website_summaries.verdict: Lighter-weight version of others in the SOG line with some nice design features to make it worth the extra cost. Thin edge on the blade. Great balance for throwing.
pros: Nylon handle is great for gripping
Very easy to handle and lightweight at about 1.5 pounds
Company stands behind its product with a lifetime warranty
Size makes it great to take with you when you travel, hike, or camp
cons: The sheath works well but is not as high quality as the axe itself

customer_reviews.title: The handle will break.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a throwing ax, the handle broke during the first session.
customer_reviews.author: poorboy

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Got to use this axe twice, for a couple hours each time. On the second time of use, it hit the target and brok in half. Pics attached.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Where She Going This Time?
customer_reviews.text: As far as tomahawks go...this one is a beauty. It came razor sharp...and super polished. Just don't try and throw it unless you're an expert. The pummel at the bottom of the handle catches on my fingers as I release it...thus sending the hawk flying off in all kinds of directions but the one I intended. EDIT: 2017-12-24. Was using the tomahawk today and the head sheared off at the first rivet. The steel inside was of a different consistency on each side of the rivet. Currently awaiting help from Amazon to see if SOG will repair and/or replace this hawk using its "Limited Lifetime Warranty". More to follow....
customer_reviews.author: William J. Turner, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: First and last purchase from SOG
customer_reviews.text: The quality isn't there with this item. I was actually impressed with my roommates throwing axes from this company. But upon ordering this... The quality is sub par. The first one came with metal shavings, a bolt with a jacked up pattern that you definitely won't be able to re tighten.. Issues with the sheath. I decided to give them a second chance and get a replacement. The replacement has rust on it. And the balance. I'm done. I'm sticking with cold steel.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrRick

customer_reviews.title: Broke instantly
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this axe, but was disappointed. The second throw the axe snapped right in half! Not durable at all and a waste of $40 in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Heinz 57

customer_reviews.title: Plastic handle broke on first throw
customer_reviews.text: The plastic handle broke on the first use. Took the axe to the local axe throwing establishment. When it fell from the target the handle sheared in two. Not very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: SMcKay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, tough, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: First off I bought this piece because of the beauty of the axe head design, and possibly to throw around in the yard. I have thrown it around and the handle has some wobble to it, I attempted to tighten it but it still wobbled a bit by design. The head is cast which is how they got the logo in, I find that interesting. It is indeed tough, I threw it bad once and it bounced on the road twice, but I couldn't find any damage or even a scratch. Overall, it's a good buy in my opinion you get more than you pay for at the $38 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Rog

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a couple of weeks to throw it at a pine built target and the handle broke in half. I threw it into the softest wood and it broke. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: tmaldo01

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke in half
customer_reviews.text: Less than 200 throws being a throwing tomahawk camping hatchet is very poorly constructed being the handle broke into two pieces and the head became loose after less than 20 rows should not be advertised as a throwing axe very disappointed in SOG
customer_reviews.author: paul miller

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in quality of product.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on throwing Axes. Purchased this as a gift for my son who throws. He is an avid thrower. And loved the gift and how accurate it threw. 11 th throw and it broke. A gift that lasted 15 minutes. Would appreciate a responses on quality verses price and what can be done about it. Very disappointed in a gift that must have been made for show and not to actuallyuse
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kniffen.

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product....broke on the first throw at a tree. handle just snapped in half...i was so shocked and in disbelief that i actually stared at the broken pieces on the ground with my mouth wide open. This ax is NOT to be thrown....AT ALL. I got in touch with the seller and was given a replacement. Im never gonna throw this ax ever again....neither am i gonna used it for heavy work. SHAME ON YOU S.O.G!!! If i could rate this product a 0 star i would. Anyone rating this product any more either works 4 S.O.G. or they haven't thrown the ax at anything. they simply examined it buy eye.
customer_reviews.author: Bigzoe

customer_reviews.title: If handle breaks, "make a new one!"
customer_reviews.text: This tomahawk is one of the best I've bought in a while. I'm glad I did!! I know it says it can be thrown, but use your head Guys!! The handle is glass filled nylon composite! And not meant for throwing! If you have issues with the handle, fix it!!! Make your own and stop complaining when it breaks after throwing it full force towards a hard surface!!! Mine has Never broke and if it does the quality of the steel won't be affected and a new handle would be made from oak!!
customer_reviews.author: Urban Crusader

customer_reviews.title: Very good....as a weapon
customer_reviews.text: This a very nice tomahawk. Very light weight but it feels very balanced. The craftsmanship of this tomahawk and other SOG products are very well made and designed. The only reason I made this 4/5 stars is that it doesn't really hold up as a tool. I bought it to try and use it as a nice, durable camping axe but I quickly realized that it really can't be used as anything besides a weapon. This isn't bad in any way, lots of SOG products are supposed to be used strictly for tactical purposes but as a camp axe it's not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Noah M.

customer_reviews.title: My wife the Viking.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our emergency bags, but my wife has taken a liking to this and has adopted it for her everyday yard tool box. Trust me, that woman knows tools and only decides to keep what works in her tool stash. So, I bought another and that one is stored nicely in her emergency bag.
customer_reviews.author: michael nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Great axe. Not so great sheath.
customer_reviews.text: The axe itself is PERFECT. It's solid, premium feeling, and cray sharp out of the box. The only bad thing is the holster/sheath. It's pretty tough to get the axe out of the sheath quickly if you need it. It pretty much requires two hands to open the sheath, hold it open, and the pull the axe out, while being carefull it doesn't snag on the holster.
customer_reviews.author: Pimpshrimp247

customer_reviews.title: Handle is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I pulled it out of the package, threw it about 10 times, enough to get the hang of sticking it, and the handle broke less than 10 min out of the package. I should have snapped a picture of the head still stuck in the stump with the handle laying on the ground, but I was too heartbroken to think clearly. Extremely disappointed that this beautiful piece is so fragile and effectively useless
customer_reviews.author: kyle johnson

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice item love the edge for the blade and spike end on it. The sheath is a tight exact fit and makes it feel very secure even for carry purpose. Only complaint is the handle feels like it was a bit of an after thought. Was expecting a bit more texturing on the grip and more solid feel but still for the price can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Get this
customer_reviews.text: Wow what an amazing axe, I’m a thrower and can’t believe how well this axe stands up to the abuse, highly recommend to anyone, she is well crafted and balanced, also looks sexy as hell
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUS BANG FOR YOUR BUCK
customer_reviews.text: Bought for multi use, from camping to home defense. Was a bit iffy on the purchase but I am beyond pleased with it. Very well balanced and extremely sturdy design. Blade of the axe came sharp enough for a close shave with no shaving cream. (Not an exaggeration, actually tried it). Couldn’t recommend this combat axe more highly.
customer_reviews.author: Griffindor

customer_reviews.title: The Best survivor tool kept in truck!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why I buy so many things at my old age but when a company makes items that are so well made, I have to have one. This hatchet I keep in my truck as a survivor tool only. If needed as a weapon or to brake a window it will work very well for both! I have given as a gift to my outdoor buddy’s and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I love the pummel. But if you take that away, the band below the bolts holding the head on is absolutely invaluable. I throw this a lot and the solid metal band is just now starting to show wear. It really saves in regards to impact forces.
customer_reviews.author: tdStandingwater

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good tool but I have a regular voodoo ...
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much "mini" about this hawk. Same length, head is about an inch or so shorter. The Fasthawk and Tactical hawk have a much greater difference in size and weight. Looks like a good tool but I have a regular voodoo hawk and a Survival hawk and not sure of the point of having this one. The Tactical and Fastawks have the optional hard nylon sheaths which work well and are operated intuitively.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This one is the real deal compared to the rest. Very sharp and lightweight. I use this when we go camping to chop small firewood pieces (not huge logs) for our camping group. Handy tool that is getting close to being replaced with another one soon as we camp quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: just got i a while ago .... sturdy and ... well i cut my finger all the way through the skin and into the muscle clean while practicing with it so needless to say its sharp ... the grip is a little slippy but most blade handles are ... just get you some hockey tape and your good to go all and all i love it ... hmm may have to buy another for my other hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service by Pro-mark
customer_reviews.text: The first tomahawk I received was defective so was returned. Pro-mark reached out and sent a new one, which demonstrated great customer service. This one, upon testing, has held up very well and has restored my faith in SOG. Thank you for the amazing service Pro-mark!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Basham

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tomahawk! Only down side is the pummel rusts exceptionally quickly so be aware and maintain your hawk!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tomahawk/ hatchet
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a groomsman gift for my wedding because I felt that the usual gifts were boring as all hades. These were a real hit with the boys and all the wedding guests. My groomsman are the outdoorsy type and appreciated something that was sentimental but functional. A couple used it on a 2-day backpacking trip and said they used it constantly while in camp. Light, sharp, strong. Take a pro-tip and wrap some parachord around the handle for extra grip.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Out of the box sharp enough that I was able to shave a patch of hair from my arm... My standard test.... I wrapped the handle with a grip tape for more friction and I absolutely love this thing. Replaces my machete for my outdoor and hiking activities. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy sharp/pointy for sticking targets for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I would give 6 stars for ease of throwing. I would give 8 stars for ease of losing after a missed throw. Yes, the stainless polished steel helps, but a bright orange wrapped paracord grip is even better. The existing grip is very strong....but it is slick when wet or if you don't wear gloves when throwing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great hawk but the sheath broke.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tomahawk. Took it camping. The sheath broke within the first week of use. I made a much nicer one out of leather. The tomahawk is great though!
customer_reviews.author: Nik88

customer_reviews.title: Poorly engineered!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk broke on 3rd throw. Don’t wast your time on SOG I bought the three pack as well light flimsy trash not suitable to throw at anything outside at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Bad engineering just like breaks one being thrown
customer_reviews.text: This life is advertised as a throwing ax if you don’t it’s life it will break it’s hollow in the center between actually in the handle which cannot take any impact of pressure that needs to be repaired and re-engineered
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for the neighbor kid he loves it we don’t have very many cats left in the neighborhood Win-win for me😂
customer_reviews.author: Michael Treharn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool !
customer_reviews.text: This tomohawk is the perfect weight and size. Very sharp and thick blade! Can definitely be used for survival or self-defense. Unfortunately, there is no hole at the bottom of the handle for a paracord. Nevertheless, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Arto Zeronian

customer_reviews.title: The all around usefulness
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it. I am aware of the handle an was worried that for close to 100 for one . An then a similar deal of three of same company but different style set I believe solid metal. But I wanted a combo for fishing an I worry about the snap of the handle but I didn’t buy it for cold weather an I feel like the cold would provoke that problem. It has been perfect for y I purchased it . Well worth it . I think it’s a good buy . So far
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, sharp and comfortable to hold. Haven't been able to take it camping yet but it feels great. Only thing I wasn't a complete fan of was the case sent with it, but as I am not planning on wearing it around often I don't think I will need to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for camping or self defense.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, sturdy, well made product indicative of SOG quality. Great for camping or self defense. It is lighter weight than I expected and comes with a sheath. I highly recommend this product and the SOG company.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Neel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of work
customer_reviews.text: good weight Beautiful to look at and sharp enough to shave the hair off your arms. Only time will tell if it's durable or not. But its a nice balanced axe
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This throwing ax is so strong and balanced very well. No problem throwing and/or chopping. A blast. I'm going to order the 3 smaller ones that come as a pack; so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: it also throws well and feels amazing in the hands
customer_reviews.text: i am going to start by saying this tomahawk is sharp enough to pass the paper slice test. it is crazily strong (i dropped it on rocks and it didn't scratch or chip). it also throws well and feels amazing in the hands. i recently used it to chop a tree down and it sliced threw the tree like it wasn't there. overall this product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Rawal

customer_reviews.title: Best Axe I have seen for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Axe! Well balanced and constructed with a slick finish that makes everyone envious of your new buy. Be careful handling when purchased because it comes with a razor sharp edge straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and perfectly balanced- the sheath is crap, but the hatchet is perfect- and extremely extremely tough!
customer_reviews.author: James Straightnlevel@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Well made, balanced, came with nice sheath.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Haven't thrown yet but seems hefty, well balanced and sturdy. Excited to try out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: ... other SOG products and this hawk is just as good as the rest
customer_reviews.text: I have other SOG products and this hawk is just as good as the rest. Good feel and balance to it so it should throw well. I have thrown it many times and no problems. If you had six stars I'd give it seven. I have a piece of elk and it has missed a few times hitting handle first and still tight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my grandson and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Nanette Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my best man. He loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my best man. He loved it. He's a major Raiders fan and loves silver and black. Sharp, well made, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JC84

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fanfreakingtastic. Beautiful and great quality. Case leaves a bit to be desired. I did see that another case was being sold but it was the same price as the tomahawk
customer_reviews.author: epic

customer_reviews.title: Fun for throwing
customer_reviews.text: Fun for throwing, also nice for doing light yardwork trimming up bushes and taking out small trees. The head does tend to get a little loose but so far no real issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chidwick

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Best tomahawk/ axe you can get. This design and build is perfect. It has been strong a reliable enough to use for fun as well as work.
customer_reviews.author: christopher huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Nice little axe
customer_reviews.text: Great weight .has a good edge very solid but the case is very cheap the snap broke on it after just a couple of times of unsnapping it and it's not made out of very good material.. would have gave it a 5 🌟 if the holster was better
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: great throwing hatchet, but also useful around the campfire. .
customer_reviews.text: Caution, it Arrives sharp enough to shave with, no joke :) superb quality, compact, useful.
customer_reviews.author: RunsWithScissors

customer_reviews.title: To use or not to use
customer_reviews.text: It is sort of a waste, I bought this for love of the sog products and now it looks to good for me to use. I collect sharp and pointed objects
customer_reviews.author: Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ax
customer_reviews.text: Nice ax! I use it for throwing and it’s a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Love This Versatile Voodoo Hawk Mini
customer_reviews.text: This Hawk mini is superberb in weight and functionality. Serves its purpose as a versatile tool or weapon in the hands of the right individual. Easy to wield and throw.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this Ax!! I keep with my hiking and take it everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: JD Ghostman

customer_reviews.title: very nice Tomahawk
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tomahawk for the price.I own several SOG and EASTWING Tomahawks and while its not as sturdy as all metal eastwing made in usa. This SOG is surprisingly well made for China.It is very aestheticly pleasing and well balanced,cant speak for durability as I have not used it for throwing, its not why i purchased this tomahawk.I hope my review was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is the bomb. Well made great for throwing or any other use I may need. So glad I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: djmcco

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be better waited
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it is a little bit too short and not balanced very good
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and break easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for axe throwing. Within the first throw the handle snapped in half. Will be returning immediately. Don’t plan to buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Nina G

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of this thing is awesome, I have considered buying another. I think used in the right way, it just might deter a burglar;) Take care.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Harp

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: this is very cool. a little heavy for backpacking but might be worth the weight if you are cold and need fire wood.
customer_reviews.author: RickW

customer_reviews.title: Box was crushed the blade was not sharp and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Box was crushed the blade was not sharp and the button on the case broke right off the first day. He really wanted it and it is well balanced but I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah walter

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool !
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet , it looks badass!
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Great camping/hiking tool to have
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hike without it. Good weight to carry over long distances homes and very versatile. I use the back end on my steel fire rod and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Hatchet holder
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked for the holder to be different.. it doesn’t make sense when you have to push the whole hatchet through the holder to get it out. It would have been better if it had a side release. So one can pull it out quickly.. the hatchet it self is made well.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: The best axe u can buy trust me
customer_reviews.text: The best axe u can buy trust me. You can throw it cut wood anything u want this will do
customer_reviews.author: hayden

customer_reviews.title: nice.
customer_reviews.text: Not hard on the eyes and works great. Very functional and ready to go out of the box. How do you go wrong???
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wade

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: I had not out it on the throw test test
customer_reviews.author: omarfist

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I had this tomahawk for maybe 30 minutes. I was throwing it at my axe throwing target I had maybe 20 throws and the handle snap at the base of the tang. Rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough, sharp enough to shave with. I wish there was less plastic, though.
customer_reviews.author: sandt38

customer_reviews.title: The axe itself is a great. My wife loves it but I accidentally order ...
customer_reviews.text: The axe itself is a great. My wife loves it but I accidentally order two which is a good thing cause she trashed the packaging it came in and then we saw that the blade cover was damage so we are not able to return the other one cause we took the cover off of that one and put the other in my lock box.
customer_reviews.author: None none

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy sturdy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. Nice sharp blade. Heavy in my hand doesn't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: John Penfold

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Brother absolutely loved this! Very well made and good quality . Especially for the price- would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as it looks! Hold up to some hard hitting!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Spann

customer_reviews.title: The hawk itself is beautiful. The quality is top notch
customer_reviews.text: The hawk itself is beautiful. The quality is top notch. Now the sheath is another thing it fell apart on me the snap closure came off
customer_reviews.author: E.C

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Axe
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a bunch when they were on sale and used them as Groomsmen Gifts. They loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Sammyo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Gave as bday gift on Friday night and by Sunday it had already broke. Felt nice to hold. Felt heavy duty enough but clear not the case. Got new arriving soon. Figures crossed this one is made right.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Customer review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift. Wished it was better , but they loved it so it’s coo I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Cha apr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic handle
customer_reviews.text: Would have preferred a hard molded rubber handle for a better grip over the cheap hard plastic handle that slips in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love this Axe
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks i have been throwing it and have had some fun and it is solid keep it in my camper for fun when outside!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cary In Sugar Hill

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it belongs on your hand.
customer_reviews.text: Handle feels good. The Axe will need to be sharpened, it isn't dule but could use a good sharpening. It feels comfortable in your hand and feels like it can handle the job or chopping small wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: SOG quality doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: SOG hit the mark, this tool has feel of craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: Edward T Gahl

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built axe
customer_reviews.text: You can shave with this thing! It works very well. Nicely built axe. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jrog

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome and fun
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome and fun. great for camping, threw it at a tree to impress the wife and it stuck perfectly first time.
customer_reviews.author: JT Scheiblich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Im very impressed with this. Great craftsmanship. Very sharp. Battle ready. Not sure If I’d throw it but def would hold up if you did. Perfect for vehicle and camping
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and price
customer_reviews.text: At this price and quality, NO ONE could complain! Very good product and price. I recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: jseeker

customer_reviews.title: Nice tomahawk cheap sheath
customer_reviews.text: The bottom to the sheath broke the second time I pulled it out. Nice tomahawk horrible sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a buddy
customer_reviews.text: Bought if for a friend for his birthday. He sent me some videos of him throwing it. It seemed to stick better than the 3 others he was throwing. Said that he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice hatchet
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best hatchet out there nicely balanced and sharp a great buy
customer_reviews.author: GUYLIATH

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw, not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within the first hour. The handle is not durable at all. I cannot fathom any reason to pay this much for such a cheaply made tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like I was expecting to be, It is top heavy, making it a tad difficult to throw long distances, Not balanced. I will just remain with my SOG Fast-hawk black nylon handles from now on for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gipson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesomely constructed and feels pretty heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesomely constructed and feels pretty heavy duty. Works well as a camping axe with a bad ass look.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great Tomahawk!
customer_reviews.text: Great tomahawk for a hiking kit. It’s rugged, durable and light weight for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Peterman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SOG makes such excellent products, this one looks great & also very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Soliz

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Sharp axe! This is a great axe to use for the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: ... fits on the back of a day pack and SUPER USEFUL Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This fits on the back of a day pack and SUPER USEFUL Fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of gear !! Perfect for backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tactical hatchet, perfect for camping, and small gear adventures. Great craftsmanship!! Easy to clean, sheath is very durable and stiff. Belt loop fits extra wide belts. All in all 10/10. By my standards
customer_reviews.author: Billy F.

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this. On his tool belt for emergency around the farm.
customer_reviews.author: Nina S-G

customer_reviews.title: send a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Well I just noticed my return expired on the 31st I got these for my boys birthdays today is the 3rd and after using them for the 1st time about 10 minutes one of the handles broke so what do I do these are not cheap?
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Love my voodoo hawk It AWESOM I love the weight
customer_reviews.text: Love my voodoo hawk It AWESOM I love the weight, style and look.it was a must Ladies get one
customer_reviews.author: GrandMaSug

product_meta.title: SOG Tomahawk Tactical Hatchet - Voodoo Hawk Mini Tactical Axe, Throwing Hatchet w/ 2.75 Inch Blade for Survival Sports and Camping Axes (F182N-CP)
product_meta.description: The Voodoo Hawk Mini is a small, heavy-duty Multiuse Axe designed for the tactician as well as the practical user – A great all-around camping Axe, backpacking Axe, survival Axe and throwing Axe with a versatile ballistic nylon carry sheath. Use the Voodoo Hawk at Home, in camp and on the trail, and even discover the ease of using it at a distance as a very formidable throwing Hatchet and tactical Axe.
feature_bullets: 12.5 INCH STAINLESS STEEL AXE HEAD: The Voodoo Hawk mini tactical axe is a chopping axe, camping axe, backpacking axe and hunting hatchet with a 2.75 inch satin-polished stainless steel blade
23.1 OUNCE LIGHTWEIGHT HAND AXE: Light yet very heavy-duty, Voodoo Hawk throwing axes are both superb survival tools and a smart practical choice as a chopping axe or backpacking axe
OUTDOOR SURVIVAL HATCHET WITH SHEATH: This emergency axe, throwing hatchet and hiking hatchet includes a ballistic nylon sheath that can be slung from your belt or gear for easy access
HAMMER POMMEL AND PIERCING SPIKE: The Voodoo Hawk tactical axe tool features a stainless steel pommel for hammering and a spike opposite the mini axe head for piercing
SOG FOR LIFE: Take care of your mini tactical axe and we’ll take care of you; we gladly consider repairs and replacements for your properly maintained SOG Voodoo Hawk tomahawk hatchet
